channel.title: How To Recover Rare Names, A Full Guide By Heaven
channel.description:
[i][b]Chapter 1: So You Want To Recover A Rare Name Without Any Info?[/b][/i]
Well, about 2 weeks ago, I decided to try fake recovering, and added my own mix of it. After supplying fake details, I decided to attempt to recover the account "Cow". Guess what? It worked. I am starting to think that jagex's recovering is just a robot too. But, I highly doubt it. :) The cool things about rare names is that you get many fans. You feel like zezima, but you feel like a god. Because of this, I decided to make a guide on how to recover rare names.
In this guide I will show you tips on how to recover rare names, how to recover them, and which accounts are suitable to recover. I can't guarantee success using this guide, as it CAN and most likely WILL take many tries. Using this guide, will not get you banned. I don't know how long this guide will work for, for awhile, I assume. Proper grammar really helps, even if some of you don't like to use it. ;)
This guide, does not require any skill, money, cash, websites, programs, or anything! Just imagination! And finally, i'm on ubuntu, sorry for such big images. I couldn't crop them.
[size=15pt]DO NOT STEALS THIS GUIDE! IF ANYONE SEE'S IT ANYWHERE BUT ON MOPAR, PM ME![/size]
(C) Heaven, Leechers Will Be Shot, Hung, And Then Bum Raped.
[i][b]Chapter 2: How To Get To Where You Need To Go To Recover Names.[/b][/i]
[shadow=red,left]SKIP THIS PART IF YOU KNOW HOW TO RECOVER ACCOUNTS![/shadow]
Here comes the [u]easiest[/u] part of getting a rare name! Getting to the place where you need to recover accounts! Don't know how to do that? Are you a complete noob that shouldn't be on mopar in the first place? *cough* I've set up some pictures on how to get there.
Step 1:Go to [url=http://Runescape.com]Runescape.com[/url] Go to/click "Recover A Lost Password"
Picture: [img]http://i9.tinypic.com/6bnri85.png[/img]
Step 2: Choosing the name. Think of a rare name, however this could be useful for many other things! Like hacking high levels! Things to consider : try names that haven't been logged in for atleast a year. You can tell if they are off tutorial island or are active by seeing if they ever come online, have a clan chat, and whether or not construction & or hunter is in the highscores. This doesn't mean they aren't active though, so be [b][u]Careful,[/u][/b] choose names wisely. I chose the account "Cow", and i have him today.
Once you are done, place the name in the box, and select from the drop menu, I have forgot my password. The reason we do this is to tell jagex that we were once active, most likely in RSC, depending on the account you are recovering.
Picture: [img]http://i16.tinypic.com/65z2dkw.png[/img]
Congrats! You're at the part where you recover accounts!
P.S:Sorry about using your name bebe, as a demonstration, I didn't acctually send it in to jagex to recover, i used it for the pictures. Dunno if it's acctually yours lol, but your email has bebemycat2 in it so w/e.
[i][b]Chapter 3: Recovering The Account.[/b][/i]
You've made it this far! Don't give up now! THIS IS THE HARDEST PART OF MY GUIDE, BUT THE FUNNEST! You've probably been wondering, why I haven't mentioned how to recover the accounts in the first place, well here it is! The basic idea is to give fake information, while providing truthful information. Accounts with recoveries, are harder to recover, but simply check " I Did Not Set Any Recovery Questions ", even if there is, as you don't want to bother guessing them. If it is a higher level though, you could TRY to supply fake recoveries, although it has not been tested by myself. Consider finding a account that has never been members, as it will help. For previous passwords, use common old passwords such as "idontknow", "fishing" and "cooking". I used those three in order to get my rare name. For the zip code, consider saying in the other details section that you moved. You can either use the one you made the account with, or the one you have after you used. For the I.P, just use the i.p you have now, or make one up. If you have a static i.p then 100% just put your own. From lastly logged in, for rare names, put atleast 1 - 5 years. No more or less then that, or it won't be believed unless you make up a really good story. For email address, make one up. For new password, put down a password that you can [u]remember[/u] if the account is recovered. The hardest part of this is the other details part. Consider looking at my example(s). Since this information is obviously not correct, you are going to want to give a good explanation.
Things to include if you want to make your own:
Things to include & or consider are: 1)Date created 2 Creation IP, not needed, sometimes this makes it a decline 3 ISP IP, same as above. 4Location created (Country, State, Province..Etc.) 5 Say you moved, as this is the most effective way to get accounts.
Example:
[code] Dear jagex, I have been playing runescape for many years. After RS2 came out, I decided to quit due to personal reasons. I wish to play again. Since I last logged in, I know I have not played for a long time, and obviously forgot alot of my information, but I did provide what i think is accurate. My dad is in the military so we move alot, and therefore i probably lost/threw them out. Thanks. [/code]
if needed, I will make more examples, but I know that mopar isn't retarted so this shouldn't be hard.
Remember - this guide is more about imagination, then a tutorial. Be creative!
Picture: [img]http://i19.tinypic.com/4xm1pb7.png[/img]
[i][b]Chapter 4: Activating & Waiting[/b][/i] After clicking submit, after you are satisfied with your information, it will tell you you do not have enough information. This is normal, it will then give you a activation code. Enter it into the box, and it will tell you to wait. Write down / make a text document with the activation code in it. To check on it's progress, go to the main page and click on "Track a recovery request" and enter the code. It generally takes a few days to activate, as jagex can take days to decide these vital decisions. However, it can also take 5 minutes. If it gets declined, it usually takes about 20 minutes to get declined. If it gets declined, try again! If it gets accepted, woohoo!!!
[i][b]Chapter 5: Conclusion + Results[/b][/i]
This guide was created 100% By Me, Heaven.
If you liked this guide, please post, I worked on this for a couple hours acctually.
Picture of proof i own the account cow: [img]http://i15.tinypic.com/4znfqes.png[/img]
P.S:This is my first tutorial, I am not very good at writing them yet. But hopefully i will learn D:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Heaven~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

item.title: How To Recover Rare Names, A Full Guide By Heaven
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

This won’t work anymore due to Jagex’s recovery system updates they have been worked on for the past few months (especially the big update they posted on the main page two (?) weeks ago). When I tried recovering my own account a couple months ago (it was locked probably because someone tried something like this on it repeatedly) and even with the correct recovery answers Jagex would still not let me have it. Eventually I got it back, but this just shows how secure the system is now.

Read full topic

Unfortunately the information you have provided us with does not match our records. Please ensure that the information you provide is correct, as we are unable to issue you with a new password without this information.
To regain control of this account could you please provide us with the following information:

Passwords:
Instances of old passwords used on this account, the earlier the better.

Sincerely
The RuneScape support team <— Lul stfu[/quote]

Try and try again, I got “Cherry drop” the other day. Trying one currently. They’re pretty easy if you keep trying with the same info.
